scripts.dev:relay: concurrently -n vite,relay -c blue,green "vite" "uv run --directory services/home-relay python relay.py"
scripts.check: pnpm lint:sh && pnpm typecheck && pnpm build
scripts.analyze:
ANALYZE=true vite build && echo '
Bundle analysis generated: stats.html'
scripts.gen:api: cd services/home-relay && uv run python -c "from app.main import app; import json; print(json.dumps(app.openapi()))" > /tmp/openapi.json && cd ../.. && npx @hey-api/openapi-ts -i /tmp/openapi.json -o src/api/generated -c @hey-api/client-fetch
scripts.gen:api:check: pnpm gen:api && git diff --exit-code src/api/generated || (echo 'Error: Generated API client is out of sync. Run pnpm gen:api and commit.' && exit 1)
